fees.description: A $14.30 (GST Incl) fee may apply when your property is reconnected (including when you move). Fee may vary.
A $14.30 (GST Incl) fee may apply when your property is disconnected (including when you move). Fee may vary.
A fee of $15.00 (GST exempt) may apply if your bill is not paid by the due date.
A 0.27% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by VISA debit card.
A 0.65% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by VISA credit card.
A 0.33% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by Mastercard debit card.
A 0.67% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by Mastercard credit card.
If you pay at an Australia Post outlet, a payment processing fee of the higher of $2.70 or 0.49% (incl GST) may apply.
$2.15 (incl GST) may apply for each paper bill.
A 0.64% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by American Express credit card.

gasContract.terms: Offer not available in all areas or properties connecting for first time. Residential customers only. Visit originenergy.com.au/2889/Terms-and-conditions for more.
gasContract.variation: We may vary the Charges (including their amount, nature and structure) by notice to you at any time. The notice will be at least 5 business days prior to the effective date of the variation.

incentives.description: For this online only plan, choose upto 3 perks with electricity or 4 perks with electricity & natural gas. Perks include A one-off $50 (Incl. GST) credit to electricity bill, 10K Everyday Rewards points, A $50 (Incl. GST) EG eGift card, 6 months Paramount +, 3 months half price Internet, or 12 months Home Assistance, unless your energy plan ends. You must provide a valid email and have an active account when perks are issued. T&C's apply, refer to url www.originenergy.com.au/value-builder-plan/

eligibility.description: Offer only available to residential customers who sign up online, provide a valid email address, meet the eligibility criteria for perks selected when you sign up, and for which we will send you a separate email confirming the details of the perks and you do not end this Energy Plan before you have received the perks.

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: At the end of the benefit period we may extend your current Energy Plan or set you up with a new Energy Plan but only if we have written to you first and you havent told us not to.
gasContract.additionalFeeInformation: You must pay us any charges your distributor imposes on us in relation to services performed by your distributor (or anyone else) at your supply address. For details on additional charges that may apply see www.originenergy.com.au/2402/Additional-charges
